name: Resident Evil Crossfire
storyline:
November 1998.
A Umbrella's shareholder who feared for his losses, managed to steal
several experiments of the company, and he could hinder the plans of Umbrella
to escape from imminent bankruptcy.
Umbrella sends agents to stop him, but he escapes spreading T-Virus in Ashport and causing chaos. Seeing this Umbrella sends UBCS there to contain the infection that will affect more yet the business and puts a price on the the shareholder's head. That's where enters the first protagonist, Paul Carter.
At the same time the government sends its agents to investigate the same shareholder suspected of acquiring BOWs and that's going into the second, but not least protagonist, Clark Carter. He happens to be Paul's brother. The two did not have a good value for your ideals are different and they will meet from diferent sides.
summary: Resident Evil: Crossfire was a Resident Evil fan game designed by Thor Steinbach in 2001. Set in Raccoon City during the Raccoon City Incident, it stars gothic high school student Lucrecia Callahan as the primary protagonist, who is caught at the subway station when the outbreak reaches her. At that point she frantically tries to reach her friends' house to save them. The second playable character is college student on leave, Felicity White.
